content:
Sure, here is a 12-week content calendar outline for 2 videos per week that are also converted into a blog post each:

Week 1: Introduction to Holistic Skincare - In this video, introduce yourself and your channel and explain the concept of holistic skincare. Create a blog post that goes into more detail about the benefits of holistic skincare and provides tips for getting started.

Week 2: Natural Beauty - In this video, share your favorite natural beauty tips and tricks. Create a blog post that provides a more in-depth look at natural beauty products and offers a guide to creating your own DIY beauty products.

Week 3: Holistic Health Remedies - In this video, share your favorite holistic health remedies for common ailments such as colds and sleeplessness. Create a blog post that provides more information on these remedies and offers tips for incorporating them into your daily routine.

Week 4: Hair Regrowth - In this video, share tips and techniques for promoting hair regrowth. Create a blog post that provides more information on the causes of hair loss and offers a guide to natural hair regrowth treatments.

Week 5: Anti-Aging Without Botox or Chemicals - In this video, share tips and techniques for anti-aging without the use of chemicals or botox. Create a blog post that provides more information on the dangers of botox and chemicals and offers a guide to natural anti-aging methods.

Week 6: Makeup Without Harsh Chemicals - In this video, share your favorite makeup products that are free of harsh chemicals. Create a blog post that provides more information on the dangers of chemicals in makeup and offers a guide to natural makeup products.

Week 7: Holistic Sinus Remedies - In this video, share your favorite holistic sinus remedies for sinus, colds and hormone balance. Create a blog post that provides more information on these remedies and offers tips for incorporating them into your daily routine.

Week 8: Hormone Balance - In this video, share tips and techniques for promoting hormone balance. Create a blog post that provides more information on the causes of hormone imbalance and offers a guide to natural hormone balancing methods.

Week 9: Anxiety and Depression - In this video, share your favorite holistic remedies for anxiety and depression. Create a blog post that provides more information on these remedies and offers tips for incorporating them into your daily routine.

Week 10: Q&A - In this video, answer questions from your audience. Create a blog post that provides more information on the questions answered in the video.

Week 11: Collaboration - Collaborate with an influencer, blogger, or other industry expert in your niche. Create a video and blog post about the collaboration.

Week 12: Conclusion and Next Steps - In this video, summarize your channel's main topics and offer next steps for viewers to take. Create a blog post that provides more information on next steps and offers a guide to incorporating holistic skincare and natural beauty into your daily routine.

Short videos such as YouTube shorts, Instagram reels, and TikTok videos can be created and posted on a weekly basis as micro-content to supplement the main video content.

Email Marketing:

* Build an email list by offering lead magnets such as ebooks, webinars, or cheat sheets in exchange for email addresses.
* Use the email list to nurture leads and promote your digital products or services.
* Send out one email per week, with valuable information and links to the latest blog post or video.
* Use segmentation to target specific groups of your email list with specific information.
